page.title: 20A mother's diary 30/5/85
page.content: 7.15 Ian, my husband, woke me with a cup of tea. I made breakfast. 8.15 Ian left for Tonbridge where he works for a Channel Ferry company. 8.30 Paul & Steven(13 & 9)had breakfast. 9.00 I bathed & dressed. The boys played with the computer. 10.00 My friend & daughters arrived for coffee & chat. 13.00 Lunch(spaghetti/apple pie)went to Strood by car to bank & supermarket. 16.30 Friend went home,boys watched tv,I watered plants. 18.00 We played badminton in garden. 18.45 Ian arrived home. He changed & went weight training in Gravesend. Boys played on bicycles, I made tea. 20.00 Boys bathed & watched tv 21.00 Ian returned and had a meal 21.30 Boys to bed, we watched tv. 23.00 To bed.
